text: The Democratic Republic of the Congo men's national volleyball team represents Democratic Republic of the Congo in international volleyball competitions and friendly matches. ==Results== ===African Men's Volleyball Championship=== *1993 — 6th place *2003 — 6th place *2005 — 7th place ===All-Africa Games=== *2007 — 9th place ==External links== *FIVB profile Volleyball Category:National men's volleyball teams Category:Men's sport in the Democratic Republic of the Congo Category:Volleyball in the Democratic Republic of the Congo
title: DR Congo men's national volleyball team
